description-carrousel-s2: First 42 Common Core Project in C
description-carrousel-s3: Last 42 Common Core Project in C
technologies-demandee: Technologies and languages used in the project
project-description-transcendance: The project consists of creating a WebApp that allows users to play the game Pong with a smooth user interface.
project-description-solong: Creation of a basic 2D game. The player must be able to move using the W, A, S, D keys, and the game must use the MinilibX library.
project-description-cub3d: Creation of a 'realistic' 3D graphical representation of a maze using a first-person view based on the principles of ray casting.
name: Name
subject: Subject
valid-mail1: I have received it and will get back to you shortly.
redirection-home: You will be redirected to the home page in a few seconds.
message-orientation: Rotate your device to portrait mode to continue.
paragraphe-1: I started my studies in the field of business and gained 10 years of experience in this sector. My first experience was at Intersport, where I worked for five years before launching my own company in 2016. At that time, I was designing clothing and logos, and this is where my passion for IT and creation truly began. This entrepreneurial adventure lasted a year and a half.
paragraphe-2: After that, I returned to the business sector to take part in the opening of Decathlon stores in Switzerland. In 2022, after four enriching years in this field, I decided to leave my full-time job to pursue a career in programming. I joined École 42, where I discovered coding for the first time.
paragraphe-3: Unlike my previous academic journey, this experience sparked a true passion for learning. This thirst for knowledge has continued to grow, and today, it fuels my future projects with ever-renewed enthusiasm.
hero-description: I create digital experiences that combine technical performance with design excellence.
project-1-description: Full development of a 3D pong game compatible with web and mobile browsers.
project-2-description: Thermal report automation with an intuitive interface and real-time data analysis.
project-3-description: Support platform for teachers assisting students with dys disorders using adapted tools.
project-4-description: Scheduling and employee management tool with an intuitive interface and real-time sync.
project-5-description: Creation of a 3D game inspired by Wolfenstein 3D using raycasting, fully coded in C.
project-6-description: Creation of a top-down 2D game with collection mechanics, fully coded in C.
section-contact-description: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how I can help bring it to life.
contact-subtitle: Whether you have a project in mind or just want to chat, I'd be happy to talk.
transcendance-tagline: 3D multiplayer pong game with real-time chat
transcendance-about: Transcendance is a 3D multiplayer pong game developed as the final project at 42. It combines 3D rendering with Three.js, real-time WebSocket communication, and a robust Django backend. Players can face off online, chat in-game, and track their stats.
transcendance-feature-1-desc: A fully modeled 3D pong game with Three.js for a modern visual experience
transcendance-feature-2-desc: WebSocket communication for smooth, responsive matches
transcendance-feature-3-desc: Real-time chat so players can communicate during matches
transcendance-feature-4-desc: Signup/login system with user profile management
transcendance-feature-5-desc: Performance tracking, match history, and scoreboards
transcendance-challenges: The main challenge was syncing the game in real time between multiple players with minimal latency. Implementing a robust WebSocket system and handling 3D collisions were crucial, and performance optimization was required to maintain a steady 60 FPS.
bilan-tagline: Thermal report automation with an intuitive interface
bilan-about: Bilan Futé is an innovative web platform designed to automate and simplify thermal report creation. It helps energy professionals generate precise analyses quickly while visualizing data in 3D for better understanding.
bilan-feature-1-desc: Automatic generation of thermal reports based on input data
bilan-feature-2-desc: Interactive representation of buildings and heat flow with Three.js
bilan-feature-3-desc: Secure storage and real-time sync with Supabase
bilan-feature-4-desc: Modern, responsive design built with React and TypeScript
bilan-challenges: The main challenge was delivering high-performance 3D visualization while handling complex thermal calculations. Integrating Three.js with React required an optimized architecture for smooth and accurate rendering.
apprendre-tagline: Support platform for teachers working with dys disorder students
apprendre-about: Apprendre Ensemble is an innovative educational platform that helps teachers support students with dys disorders (dyslexia, dyspraxia, dyscalculia, etc.). It provides adapted teaching tools and personalized resources to foster inclusion.
apprendre-feature-1-desc: Library of exercises and resources tailored to different dys disorders
apprendre-feature-2-desc: Progress tracking for each student with visual analytics
apprendre-feature-3-desc: Communication space to coordinate student support
apprendre-feature-4-desc: 3D modules that support spatial learning with Three.js
apprendre-impact: This project aims to make teachers' daily work easier while improving learning for students in difficulty. Accessibility and inclusion are central to every feature, helping each student progress at their own pace with the right tools.
monhoraire-tagline: Complete scheduling and employee management solution
monhoraire-about: monhoraire.ch is a SaaS platform designed to simplify schedule and team management. It enables companies to create, edit, and share schedules in real time, while facilitating communication between managers and employees.
monhoraire-feature-1-desc: Drag-and-drop interface to create and edit schedules quickly
monhoraire-feature-2-desc: Complete database with availability, skills, and history
monhoraire-feature-3-desc: Instant updates for the entire team
monhoraire-feature-4-desc: Email alerts and push notifications for schedule changes
monhoraire-feature-5-desc: PDF report generation and export to multiple formats
monhoraire-usecases: The platform is ideal for restaurants, shops, hotels, and any business that needs flexible scheduling. It significantly reduces planning time while minimizing errors and conflicts.
cub3d-tagline: 3D rendering engine inspired by Wolfenstein 3D using raycasting
cub3d-about: Cub3D is a 42 project focused on building a 3D rendering engine from scratch using raycasting, popularized by Wolfenstein 3D. Fully coded in C with the MinilibX graphics library, it explores core 3D rendering fundamentals.
cub3d-feature-1-desc: Full raycasting algorithm implementation for real-time 3D rendering
cub3d-feature-2-desc: Support for wall textures and 2D sprites with transparency handling
cub3d-feature-3-desc: 2D map showing player position and level layout
cub3d-feature-4-desc: WASD movement and mouse camera rotation
cub3d-challenges: The biggest challenge was implementing raycasting without a 3D library. Texture projection, correct distance calculations to avoid the fish-eye effect, and performance optimization were critical.
so-long-tagline: Top-down 2D collection and escape game with C rendering
so-long-about: So Long is a top-down 2D game developed in C with MinilibX as part of 42. The player collects all items before escaping through the exit while avoiding enemies. The project explores the basics of game development and 2D rendering.
so-long-feature-1-desc: Sprites, tiles, and animations rendered with MinilibX
so-long-feature-2-desc: Gameplay based on collecting items to unlock the exit
so-long-feature-3-desc: Reading and validating .ber files to load levels
so-long-feature-4-desc: Collision detection with walls, items, and enemies
so-long-challenges: The main challenge was handling keyboard events and rendering efficiently without a game engine. A robust map parser and performance optimization for many sprites were also key.
